response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I suggest we discuss a fair price that reflects both its worth and your needs. Considering the product's value to you is $150, I propose an offer of $135. This allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement while ensuring you get a great deal on a product you clearly value highly.", "product_price": 135}
